name: TICKETS FOR SAWA - MAY 27th. 8PM.
description:
Friday 27th May will play host to Stagecoach, arguably the most hyped band at the minute - ‘I’m completely addicted to Stagecoach’ BBC Radio 1‘s Huw Stephens. The band have also had recent support slots with Johnny Foreigner and Twin Atlantic and have a summer of festivals planned such as Kendal Calling, The Great Escape and 2000 trees to name a few. This indie quintet have also had tracks featured on Skins, Gavin and Stacey as well as the soundtrack to the recent ‘Killing Bono’ film. Never mind the hype, big things are already happening for this band. Joining Stagecoach will be Canada’s next big thing ‘Bravestation’ on their first UK tour, who are already making waves throughout the UK with their Foals-esque sounds as well as Sheffield’s finest ‘Smugglers Run' and 'Russian Dolls' as well as Hertfordshire rockers ‘Scholars’.
